授業方法:
Focus on content, academic skills and language skills. Also, focus on tasks, group work, paragraph and essay writing, presentations. Students will be expected to complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

For students who have permission to take this course online, the online course will be held in the following formats:
- simultaneous two-way online broadcast of face-to-face classes
- (if necessary) on-demand broadcast of data recorded from face-to-face classes

第1回: Week 1: Introductions, course overview and needs analysis
第14回: Week 14: Final project and course reflections
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are expected to complete all the tasks assigned each week, in order to prepare for the class activities.
